title: Fall Women's Herbalist Symposium
description: Fall Women's Herbalist Symposium Hosted By HerbU. Event starts on Friday, 20 October 2023 and happening at 10 N Main St, Junction, UT. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Fri Oct 20 2023 at 03:00 pm to Sun Oct 22 2023 at 12:00 pm (GMT-06:00) 10 N Main St, 10 North Main Street, Junction, United States The Fall Women's Herbalist Symposium is a three-day event focused on herbal medicine and natural remedies. Led by master Herbalist Angela Harris and other herbalists, it offers an opportunity for like-minded women to gather and learn about the use of herbs for winter-time symptoms. The symposium covers various aspects of herbal medicine, including creating herbal products, understanding the legal landscape, connecting with nature, and engaging in activities like drum circles. The event takes place from October 20th to 22nd in Junction, Utah, with accommodations provided. There's a special offer to secure a spot for $555, and discounted work scholarships are available. It's a chance to expand knowledge, connect with nature, and explore the healing potential of herbs. Tickets for Fall Women's Herbalist Symposium can be booked here.
